arts.ttl: Saka and Palmer incident sums up embarrassing England, says Roy Keane
arts.sum: England slumped to a surprise 2-1 Nations League defeat against Greece on Thursday at Wembley, and in the aftermath of the game pundit Roy Keane picked out an incident involving Bukayo Saka and Cole Palmer as typifying the Three Lions’ effort. Saka and Palmer incident sums up embarrassing England, says Roy Keane

arts.ttl: Lee Carsley makes major U-turn with brutally honest admission over England job
arts.sum: England's interim head coach Lee Carsley seemingly suggested that he is planning to return to his role with the Under-21 team after suffering an embarrassing loss to Greece

arts.ttl: Carsley coy on England as Saka limps off in loss
arts.sum: England interim manager Lee Carsley has distanced himself from taking the job full time by suggesting he would be happy to return to his previous role as the Under-21 boss.

arts.ttl: Greece gave 'soul' for Baldock in historic win
arts.sum: Greece's two-goal hero Vangelis Pavlidis paid an emotional tribute to George Baldock after his side's 2-1 Nations League victory over England at Wembley on Thursday.

arts.ttl: All-attacking England experiment fails in historic loss to Greece
arts.sum: England head back to the drawing board as interim manager Lee Carsley's plan to field various attacking players gets found out by Greece in a historic loss at Wembley.

arts.ttl: England fans left stunned as Lee Carsley reveals how long side trained with new system
arts.sum: Lee Carsley's decision to pick a bold false nine system against Greece backfired as his England side slipped to a dismal 2-1 defeat in the Nations League, with the interim boss now facing fan fury

arts.ttl: England youth international thriving at new club since leaving Leeds United
arts.sum: Lewis Bate certainly wasn’t the biggest name to leave Leeds United over the summer but he may well feel like the one that got away. The Yorkshire side parted ways with a host of names in the previous transfer window, including Crysencio Summerville, Georginio Rutter and Archie Gray — as well as Bate. arts.ttl: Greece pay tribute to 'special' George Baldock in famous win over England at Wembley
arts.sum: Baldock died in his Athens home on Wednesday night

arts.ttl: Lee Carsley sidesteps questions over permanent England job after Greece defeat
arts.sum: Greece secured a well-deserved 2-1 win at Wembley.
